snippet: Amid the national debate over immigration and the European Union, some businesses say they would be hurt if Britain left a bloc that permits the fluid flow of workers across borders.
abstract: Several businesses in Britain say they would be hurt if nation left European Union, losing bloc that permits free flow of labor across borders of 27 countries; debate is part of larger one about immigration and European Union itself.
lead_paragraph: Amid the national debate over immigration and the European Union, some businesses say they would be hurt if Britain left a bloc that permits the fluid flow of workers across borders.

headline.main: British Employers See Value in Europe-Wide Labor Pool
headline.print_headline: British Employers See Value in Europe-Wide Labor Pool
